title: january 2: no more smoking commercials
description:
Today on 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about how the world of TV moved from lots of commercials for cigarettes to none at all. Afterwards, she talks about the release of one of the greatest songs of the 2010s. Join this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: mxmtoon
